reviewText: I bought this video for my son who is going to East Africa next summer.  I was disappointed to see that it was like a home video, amateurishly done.  Though the scenery was pretty, the animals shown were mainly just standing around.  It was fun to see the kids, but, as I said, I expected more.
Do not waste your time or money.  This DVD is short and gives little information.  I have seen better vacation DVDs.
